title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When a Java editor is opened, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler does not display a menu to add breakpoints or marks.
EB: When a Java editor is opened, right-clicking on the left vertical ruler should display a menu to add breakpoints or marks.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected result: A menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints or marks.
